column1: As  such,  we  are  of  the  opinion  that  the  prosecution  has  failed  to  prove  its

A
s  such  we  are  of  the  opinion  that  the  conviction  is  bad  in  law  and  is
without merit hence, we set aside the conviction and the sentence imposed
by the trial judge and acquit the appellant and allow the instant appeal.
